title: Achieving 24x7 electricity supply for all in 2024: India's focus on coal and renewables
description: India plans to enhance its power infrastructure, aiming for uninterrupted 24x7 electricity by 2024. The Union power ministry proposed a substantial 91 GW addition to coal-based thermal power, investing Rs 7.28 lakh crore. Minister R K Singh emphasised energy security amidst geopolitical uncertainties, citing the impact of the Russia-Ukraine war on Europe.
